services.title: Snapshots
services.description: To help validators to deploy or recover quickly, BlueStake provide frequent archives of the Blockchains from high-performance infrastructure.

services.title: State-Sync
services.description: To help validators to deploy or recover quickly, BlueStake provides state-sync servers from high-performance infrastructure.

services.title: RPC & LCD endpoints
services.description: BlueStake provides public RPC and API endpoints to developers, node operators and users from high-performance infrastructure.

services.title: IBC Relayers
services.description: BlueStake provides services to boost interoperability across different blockchain networks, relaying more than 50 IBC channels from high-performance infrastructure.
